tool_description: This project is a Flask web application that calculates pivot points, resistances, and supports for a given cryptocurrency exchange.
name: Cryptocurrency Pivot Calculator
title: Cryptocurrency Pivot Calculator

api_list.name: MATIC Pivot, Resistence, Support
api_list.description: If the given exchange is **"matic"**, the application will retrieve historical data for the **Polygon (MATIC)** cryptocurrency exchange using the yfinance library. It will then calculate the pivot point, three resistance levels, and three support levels based on this data. The calculated values, along with the current date, will be returned in a JSON response when accessing the corresponding route.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-pivot-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com/matic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-pivot-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BTC Pivot, Resistence, Support
api_list.description: If the given exchange is **"btc"**, the application will retrieve historical data for the **Bitcoin (BTC)** cryptocurrency exchange using the yfinance library. It will then calculate the pivot point, three resistance levels, and three support levels based on this data. The calculated values, along with the current date, will be returned in a JSON response when accessing the corresponding route.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-pivot-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com/btc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-pivot-calculator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
